div.p: Codes identifying the stage lifecycle stage of a event
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/event-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The core event has not started yet, but some staging activities have begun (e.g. surgical suite preparation). Preparation stages may be tracked for billing purposes.
The event has been temporarily stopped but is expected to resume in the future
The event was prior to the full completion of the intended actions

This electronic record should never have existed, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it. (If real-world activity has occurred, the status should be "cancelled" rather than "entered-in-error".)
